overview:
Arnaud Saint-Paul is serial entrepreneur and CEO and co-founder of smartsy, Inc.

smartsy is a cloud-based, social mobile service that harnesses the social graph of real world objects, creating a rich, immersive web and mobile experience that empowers people to socialize around the brands and objects that matter to them.

smartsy’s iOS and Android apps, powered by powerful 2D – 3D Visual Recognition technology, can recognize the object or images placed in its database, instead of intermediate triggers, like QR codes, allowing people to interact naturally with the objects through their camera lens and enabling them to augment, editorialize, share or even acquire objects around them.

Previously, Arnaud was the founder, CEO/CTO of Equod, the 1st platform for European online retail logistics. The company’s solution allowed online retailers to seamlessly integrate and optimize their supply chain end-to-end in real time with express carriers for their logistics needs. It received an award as Best Startup by prominent popular European business magazine, Les Echos and in 2002 he successfully exited of the company. In addition to his work ad Equod, he also founded Easyviz, the former top Spanish online prescription eye glasses website. Identified as “Best Idea 2008” by leading Spanish magazine, El Economista.

Arnaud has been featured on 01Net.com, Les Echos, Trisame, CTA Directory, Journal du Net, Antena 3, PC Actual and many other publications for his innovative use of technology.

In addition, Arnaud was the President of the Centro Re-Crear, a nonprofit focused on helping people enhance their health and well being based in Madrid, Spain. He grew it to national prominence and was a featured international speaker.

Arnaud graduated from Université Panthéon Assas (Paris II) and speaks French, Spanish and English fluently, and resides in Sunnyvale, CA.
